article: Mother's Day is celebrated in the US. It is also a holiday in some other countries. It is on the second Sunday in May. It is a day to thank mothers.  _  that day mothers usually  _  flowers and cards. On the cards, children will write "Thanks, Mom", "To the best mother  in the world  .", "Best  _  for Mother's Day" and so on. Where does the idea for the holiday  come from  ? We should thank Miss Anna Mjarvis. She brought up the idea of having such a day. She lived in West Virginia. Her mother  died  on May 9, 1905. She had a deep love to her mother. She  _  letters to some important persons. In her letters, she asked them to decide a day for  all  mothers. Then Mother's Day was made on the second Sunday in May by the US in 1913. On Mother's Day, children give presents to their mothers,  _  the whole family go out and try to do  something nice  for their mothers.
